review: Very useful for my usage. Lots of YouTube viewing on my large TV screen. Worth every penny
author: Steve

review: Love it. Small device not adding additional clutter, no additional remote required. Cast netflix, youtube, pbs, photos, etc. onto TV screen. DvDs cast from the (Windows) laptop come in a bit "choppy" and I haven't yet succeeded to cast from my MacBook.....but overall a great little device with some limitations. I use it all the time
author: Sabine Kuhn

review: Was a little laggy, but it worked fine
author: Amazon Customer

review: Just fantastic for the price!I take on my trips,  use it to check photos,  mirror my phone screen, etc.My son watches films from the notebook and his cartoons with this thing.Probably the best thing I ever bought on amazon.
author: Lucas

review: It is good to use in USA, but in other country, I found it extremely hard to connect to WIFI.
author: weimin
